refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Exit with a status code indicating failure.

listitem.para: NOTE: your shell may have its own version of false, which usually supersedes the version described here. Please refer to your shell's documentation for details about the options it supports.
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report false translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for false is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and false programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
